PropertyList.title: Zeppelin NT07 airship

key.name: W
key.desc: Weigh-off to 700 lbs heavy by adding/removing ballast. (Takes about 10 seconds and only works on ground.)

key.name: Y
key.desc: Release mooring mast connection or wire.

key.name: U
key.desc: Attach mooring wire. Only possible within 100 feet of the mooring mast.

key.name: w
key.desc: Passenger view: walk forwards, +shift to run.

key.name: a
key.desc: Passenger view: side step left, +shift to run.

key.name: d
key.desc: Passenger view: side step right, +shift to run.

PropertyList.text:
____________________Engine controls____________________
RPM select: Blue levers, controlled by throttle axis (PgUp/PgDown). Mixture: Red levers, controlled by mixture axis (m/M). Thrust (propeller pitch): Black levers, controlled by propeller axis (n/N).
Take off/Landing: RPM select fully forward, use thrust levers for control. Cruise: Thrust levers fully forward, use RPM select for control.
____________________Limitations____________________ Vne : 70 kt Vmo : 45 kt
Envelope Maximum pressure 2.4 inH2O (600 Pa; 12.5 psf) Minimum pressure 1.2 inH2O (300 Pa; 6.3 psf)
C.G. Range Take off and Landing Maximum Forward 1344.5 in Maximum Aft 1374.0 in In Flight Maximum Forward 1315.0 in Maximum Aft 1374.0 in
Maximum equilibrium weight : 16,865 lbs (7650 kg) Maximum static heavyness: In Flight : 1,102 lbs (500 kg) Take off/Landing : 882 lbs (400 kg) Maximum static lightness : -441 lbs (-200 kg)
Maximum operating altitude : 10,000 ft
